name: Cheese Board
storyline: Explore four worlds of levels with ever increasing difficulty. With beautiful hand-painted backdrops and soothing music. Travel the world map to reach the final level and complete the game. Try to achieve better high-scores and improve your skills in replays. A family friendly game of skill and an audio-visual experience.
summary: A family-friendly game of skill for mobile devices. You move a yellow ball, a giant "ball of cheese", over a play-field full of traps and obstacles. The ball is moved by rolling and tilting your device. Follow the path to earn extra points - or take the shortcut and get your cheese home the easy way. Avoid holes, traps and obstacles. It's a game similar to popular labyrinth marble maze games, and yet it's different!
